banking_clan.text: The banking clan will sign {0}'s treaty.

ooba.text:
{0} lost the will to live.

ooba ooba :(

sprain.text: {0} sprains their ankle falling onto a conveyor, and is crushed by machinery in the droid foundry.

splatter.text:
{1} is casually crossing the podracing track.

{0} runs over {1}.
Now this is podracing!

bisect.text: After a lightsaber duel with {0}, {1} ends up walking away only half the man they used to be.

bad_trick.text: {0} shows {1} why spinning isn't actually a good maneuver.

tragedy.text: {0} tells {1} the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the wise

feelsbad.text:
{0} has a bad feeling about this.

{1} doesn't sense anything.

deathsticks.text: {0} spikes {1} drink with deathsticks. {1} dies of an overdose.

high_ground.text:
{1} has the high ground and tells {0} not to try it.

{0} tries it anyway.

{1} cuts {0}'s legs off and leaves them to die.

hello_there.text:
{0} jumps from the ceiling and lands in front of {1}, saying "Hello there!"

{1}'s army of droids mows {0} down instantly before either of them have time to react.

{1} comments on {0}'s boldness.

ironic.text:
{0} taught {1} everything they knew, and {1} killed them in their sleep.

Ironic.

deformed.text:
{0} tries to kill {1} but {1} escapes.

This attempt on {1}'s life has left them scarred and deformed.

dewit.text:
{1} is reluctant to kill {0}.

{2} says "dewit". {1} beheads {0}

alt_high_ground.text:
{1} has the high ground and tells {0} not to try it.

{0} tries it anyway.

{0} does a front flip over {1} and stabs them in the back.

{0} kicks {1}'s lifeless corpse into the lava river and walks away triumphantly.

{2} congratulates {0} on his success and gives him a new weapon as a reward, which {0} uses to kill {2}.

sand_people.text: {0} killed not just {1} but {2} and {3} too.

the_senate.text:
{1}, {2}, {3}, and {4} go to arrest {0}.

{0} claims to be the senate, screeches, and kills them all.

worms.text:
{0} hires {1} to kill {2}

{1} hires {3} to do it.

{3} gives {4} some weird centipedes and tells {4} to throw them through {2}'s window.

Lucky for {2}, {5} and {6} were peeping through {2}'s bedroom door and saw the worms in time to save {2}.

Hungry_Acklay.text: {0}'s spear only made the arena's Acklay even hungrier in their final moments.

ShouldBuyDeathSticks.text:
{1} offers some deathsticks to {0} 

{0} tells {1} to rethink his life.

 {0}'s Jedi mind tricks don't work on {1}.

{1} shoots {0} in the head and runs away.

ChainedPoles.text:
{0}, {1} and {2} are chained to poles in the arena.

 Luckily they escape with the help of {3} and the clone army.

NotBrave.text: {1} is not brave enough for the arena.

PartiesOver.text: {0} attempts to fly away on their jetpack, but {1} decides {0}'s party is over.

Reek.text: {0} finds themself on the wrong end of a charging Reek.

nexu.text: {0} seems to be on top of things, until they realize that the hungry Nexu can climb too.

Saved.text: {2} nearly ends {0}'s plans before they even start, but is saved by {1}'s accurate shooting.

UntracebaleDart.text: {0} is killed by a seemingly untraceable poison dart. Looks like nobody will never find out it was {1} who fired it.

Qui-Gon-Dead.text: {0}'s master wanted {1} dead. {0} runs him through with lightsaber.

Alt_Grievous.text:
{1} jumps down from the balcony, and says 'hello there!' to {0}.

 {}'s droid army does nothing to stop this, as their master enters a duel with {1} and proceeds to be killed by {1}.

 {1}'s clone army drops in and destroys {0}'s droid army.

Fuel_Cells.text: {0} destroys a Techno Union ship. Unfortunately, {1} doesn't manage to run fast enough from the falling fuel cells.

Podrace_Death.text: While racing the final length of the Boonta Eve Classic podrace {1} is killed by {0}.

Rocket_Barage.text: {1} and his AT-TE crew of {2}, {3}, and {4} are caught on the wrong end of {0}'s rocket barrage.

Force_Fucked.text:
{0} and {1} team up to take down {2}. 

 {1} tells {0} that they should take on {2} together. 

 {0} ignores {1} and rushes down without {1}. 

{2} uses Force Lightning to murder the fuck out of {0}

Falling.text:
{0} and {1} are chasing {2} in a speeder.

{1} spots {2} in a speeder down below and jumps to go catch him.

{0} looks down wishing he wouldn't do that.

{1} misses {2}'s speeder and leaves a stain on the pavement

Tresspassing_On_Mandalore.text: {0} is killed by Death Watch after being found trespassing in one of their camps.

Body_Double.text: {0} dies in an explosion being a body double for {1}
